landing.title: NARA React Boilerplate
landing.subtitle: A fast, opinionated starter for building full-stack React apps
landing.description: Built with React Router v7, TypeScript, Cloudflare Workers, and modern tooling. Designed with focus on type safety, performance, and developer ergonomics.

features.title: Features
features.typeScriptDesc: Full type safety with TypeScript support
features.databaseDesc: Drizzle ORM with Cloudflare D1 integration
features.uiDesc: Beautiful components with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui

showcase.title: Showcase
showcase.description: Examples and demonstrations of the boilerplate features
